Texts.Chs: 真棒。你应该会需要很多^green;高级塑料^reset;，所以请随时保证储量！接下来，让我们帮你在黑暗中视物，怎么样？
Texts.Eng: Bravo. You'll need a ^green;lot of plastic^reset; so keep stocked! Now let's help you see in the dark, shall we?

Sweet. Now that you have a ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; we can really get working! The first plant you'll probably want to make is the ^orange;bracken tree^reset;, as the silk it creates ultimately leads to ^green;advanced plastic^reset;. Without plastic, you're sunk. Silk also sells for a decent profit. Win-Win.
